div.p: This page shows information about all the 1307 Arabidopsis Thaliana accessions for which the GWAS-Web-App contains genotype information and can be used for GWAS studies.
The page consists of 4 sections (see figure):

ul.li: Google Map: Location information of each accession
Geographic Distribution Map: Overview of the geographic distribution of the accessions

div.p:
The Filter-Box allows to filter the Accession-List according to accession-name, country and/or collector.
By clicking on any accession in the Accession-List its location is shown in the Google Map.
By clicking on any accession in the google map the accession-name and id is shown in a popup.
By moving the mouse over the Geographic Distribution Map the number of accessions for each country is shown.
